title: Son Goku
skills_text:
(When this card inflicts damage to your opponent's life, they place that many cards in their Drop Area instead of their hand.)
(Treat 《Universe 7》 cards in all areas as if they had no specified cost.)
When you have a 《Universe 7》 card in play with 25000 power or more, or your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 2 cards and flip this card over.
title_back: Ultra Instinct Son Goku, Hero of Universe 7
skills_back_text: When this card attacks, draw 1 card, then choose up to 1 《Universe 7》 card in your Battle Area and it gets +5000 power for the duration of the turn.

title: Friendly Rival Frieza
skills_text: If your Leader Card is red : When you combo with this card, choose up to 1 red Extra Card from your deck, place it in your Drop Area, then shuffle your deck.

title: Ultra Instinct Son Goku, Universal Impulse
energy_text: 2()
skills_text:
(If this card is placed in an Energy Area from any area, it must be placed there in Rest Mode.)
When you play this card, it gets +10000 power and you can't play non- 《Universe 7》 Battle Cards for the duration of the turn.
When your opponent plays a Battle Card, you may return this card to its owner's hand.

title: SSB Vegeta, Steadfast Ally
energy_text: 5()
skills_text:
(When one of your other cards is attacked, you may switch this card to Rest Mode and change the target of the attack to this card.)
(If this card is placed in an Energy Area from any area, it must be placed there in Rest Mode.)
When one of your Red/Blue multicolor Battle Cards is removed from your Battle Area by a skill, if {SSB Vegeta, Steadfast Ally} isn't in play in your Battle Area, you may play this card from your hand.

title: We're in This Together!
energy_text: 4()
skills_text:
(If this card is placed in an Energy Area from any area, it must be placed there in Rest Mode.)
If your Leader Card is a 《Universe 7》 card, choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards with 25000 power or less and KO them.
, if your Leader Card is a 《Universe 7》 card : Add this card from your Drop Area to your hand.
